languages.text: "Вера. Щит и разящий клинок, дарованный Императором слугам Его. Я с самого начала распознала в тебе свет нашего защитника, {name}. Я рада, что Он выбрал тебя, дабы свершить свою кару". {n}Чорда выглядит умиротворенной, и голос ее смягчается. Лицо ее абсолютно спокойно, и тревожный нервный тик больше не касается его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вера. Щит и разящий клинок, дарованный Императором слугам Его. Я с самого начала распознал{mf||а} в тебе свет нашего защитника, {name}. Я рада, что Он выбрал тебя, дабы свершить свою кару". {n}Чорда выглядит умиротворенной, и голос ее смягчается. Лицо ее абсолютно спокойно, и тревожный нервный тик больше не касается его.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Faith. The shield and the smiting blade were gifted by the Emperor to His servants. I saw the light of our Protector in you all along, {name}. I am glad He chose you to enact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вера. Щит и разящий клинок, дарованный Императором слугам Его. Я с самого начала распознала в тебе свет нашего защитника, {name}. Я рада, что Он выбрал тебя, дабы свершить свою кару". {n}Чорда выглядит умиротворенной, и голос ее смягчается. Лицо ее абсолютно спокойно, и тревожный нервный тик больше не касается его.{/n}

I am glad He chose you to exact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene; her voice mellows. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by the anxiety tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Faith. The shield and the smiting blade were gifted by the Emperor to His servants. I saw the light of our Protector in you all along, {name}. I am glad He chose you to enact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “是信仰的力量，信仰便是帝皇亲手赐予的盾牌与战刀。我从你身上看到了人类守护者的光芒，{name}。我很高兴祂选择你来执行祂的惩罚。”{n}库尔达神色安详，声音柔和。她的表情完全平静下来，不再有任何焦虑不安。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. The shield and the smiting blade were gifted by the Emperor to His servants. I saw the light of our Protector in you all along, {name}. I am glad He chose you to enact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是信仰的力量，信仰便是帝皇亲手赐予的盾牌与战刀。我从你身上看到了人类守护者的光芒，{name}。我很高兴祂选择你来执行祂的惩罚。”{n}库尔达神色安详，声音柔和。她的表情完全平静下来，不再有任何焦虑不安。{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「信念。盾と打ち出し刃は、皇帝が召使に賜ったものだ。私は以前よりずっと、お前の中に守護神の光が見えていたのだよ、{name}。主の裁きを執行する者としてお前が選ばれて、本当によかった」{n}チョーダは穏やかな表情で、優しい声をしていた。もう、緊張による震えは止まったようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. The shield and the smiting blade were gifted by the Emperor to His servants. I saw the light of our Protector in you all along, {name}. I am glad He chose you to enact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「信念。盾と打ち出し刃は、皇帝が召使に賜ったものだ。私は以前よりずっと、お前の中に守護神の光が見えていたのだよ、{name}。主の裁きを執行する者としてお前が選ばれて、本当によかった」{n}チョーダは穏やかな表情で、優しい声をしていた。もう、緊張による震えは止まったようだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Fe. El Emperador regaló el escudo y la espada a Sus siervos. Vi la luz de nuestro Protector en usted todo este tiempo, {name}. Me alegro de que {mf|le|la} eligiera para imponer Su castigo». {n}Chorda parece serena y su voz se ha suavizado. Su cara está calmada: ya no sufre el tic nervioso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. The shield and the smiting blade were gifted by the Emperor to His servants. I saw the light of our Protector in you all along, {name}. I am glad He chose you to enact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Fe. El Emperador regaló el escudo y la espada a Sus siervos. Vi la luz de nuestro protector en usted todo este tiempo, {name}. Me alegro de que {mf|le|la} eligiera para imponer Su castigo». {n}Chorda parece serena. Su voz se suaviza. Su cara está calmada, ya no la visita el tic de la ansiedad.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Glaube. Der Imperator hat seinen Dienern den Schild und die richtende klinge geschenkt. Ich habe die ganze Zeit über das Licht unseres Beschützers in Euch gesehen, {name}. Ich bin froh, dass er Euch erwählt hat, um seine Strafe auszuführen." {n}Chorda sieht friedlich aus. Ihre Stimme wird sanfter. Ihre Miene ist vollkommen ruhig, nicht länger von dem nervösen Zucken geplagt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. The shield and the smiting blade were gifted by the Emperor to His servants. I saw the light of our Protector in you all along, {name}. I am glad He chose you to enact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Glaube. Der Imperator hat seinen Dienern den Schild und die richtende klinge geschenkt. Ich habe die ganze Zeit über das Licht unseres Beschützers in Euch gesehen, {name}. Ich bin froh, dass er Euch erwählt hat, um seine Strafe auszuführen." {n}Chorda sieht friedlich aus. Ihre Stimme wird sanfter. Ihre Miene ist vollkommen ruhig, nicht länger von dem nervösen Zucken geplagt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « La foi, le bouclier et l'arme punitive que l'Empereur confie à Ses serviteurs. J'ai vu la lumière de notre Protecteur en vous dès notre première rencontre, {name}, et je me réjouis qu'Il vous ait {mf|choisi|choisie} pour exécuter Son châtiment. » {n}Chorda semble sereine, sa voix se fait douce. Vous ne voyez plus le moindre tic nerveux sur son visage parfaitement détendu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. The shield and the smiting blade were gifted by the Emperor to His servants. I saw the light of our Protector in you all along, {name}. I am glad He chose you to enact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La foi : le bouclier et l'arme punitive que l'Empereur confie à Ses serviteurs. J'ai vu la lumière de notre Protecteur en vous dès notre première rencontre, {name}, et je me réjouis qu'Il vous ait {mf|choisi|choisie} pour exécuter Son châtiment. » {n}Chorda semble sereine, sa voix se fait douce. Vous ne voyez plus le moindre tic d'anxiété sur son visage parfaitement détendu.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "İnanç. Kalkan ve bu kuvvetli kılıç, İmparator tarafından O'nun hizmetkârlarına armağan edilir. Koruyucumuzun ışığını her daim görebilmişimdir {name}. Adaletini sağlayacak kişi olarak seni seçtiği için mutluyum." {n}Sesi yumuşayan Chorda, huzurlu görünüyor. Yüz ifadesi son derece sakin ve gerginlikten kaynaklı tiki artık ortaya çıkmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Faith. The shield and the smiting blade were gifted by the Emperor to His servants. I saw the light of our Protector in you all along, {name}. I am glad He chose you to enact His punishment." {n}Chorda looks serene, and her voice has mellowed. Her face is completely calm, no longer visited by her nervous tic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İnanç. Kalkan ve bu kuvvetli kılıç, İmparator tarafından O'nun hizmetkârlarına armağan edilir. Koruyucu'muzun ışığını her daim görebilmişimdir {name}. Adaletini sağlayacak kişi olarak seni seçtiği için mutluyum." {n}Chorda huzurlu görünüyor. Sesi de yumuşamış durumda. Yüz ifadesi son derece sakin ve gerginlikten kaynaklı o tik artık ortaya çıkmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chorda
